t: Securely Connect IoT Devices – AWS IoT Core Pricing – Amazon Web Services

t: AWS IoT Device Management Pricing - Amazon Web Services
s: AWS IoT Device Management makes it easy for you to manage your fleets of connected devices at any scale. You only pay for what you use, and there are no minimum fees.

t: Amazon.com: IoT Inc: How Your Company Can Use the Internet of Things to Win in the Outcome Economy: 9781260025897: Sinclair: Books
AWS IoT Core Features
s: 3 days ago - The AWS IoT Device SDK lets you more easily and more quickly connect your hardware device or mobile application to AWS IoT Core. The AWS IoT Device SDK helps your devices connect, authenticate, and exchange messages with AWS IoT Core using the MQTT, HTTP, or WebSockets protocols.

t: Static thing groups - AWS IoT Core
s: Static thing groups allow you to manage several things at once by categorizing them into groups. Static thing groups contain a group of things that are managed by using the console, CLI, or the API. Dynamic thing groups , on the other hand, contain things that match a specified query.
